items.title: The Framework Laptop 16 Can Now Be Upgraded to an RTX 5070
items.description: The Nvidia RTX 5070 is coming to the Framework Laptop 16, proving that upgradable GPUs in laptops aren’t just a fool’s errand.

items.description: Every television deserves a row of speakers to call its own. These are our favorite soundbars.

items.title: Lenovo IdeaPad 5i 2-in-1 Review: Barely Squeaking By
items.description: Lenovo’s IdeaPad 5i 2-in-1 is a standard budget laptop with just enough qualities to be worth the money when it’s on sale.
